content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC assistance?
I might need someone to check my heater, but I’m not sure yet.
No problem! If your heater is giving you trouble, we can have one of our HVAC technicians take a look. To get started, may I have your name, please?
Actually, I think I’d rather not book right now. Please don’t contact me further, thanks.
Understood, I will not contact you again. If you ever need HVAC, plumbing, or electrical services, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
reason: Customer requested not to be contacted further.
